result.reason: When SQL database is read-only, local connection properties (window size, panel layout) should fall back to local XML storage instead of failing silently.
result.approach: Detect read-only SQL access and save local UI properties (panel positions, window size) to local XML config file as fallback, while keeping the SQL source as read-only for shared connection data.
